name: Jern gets a haircut
description:
In this action-packed Augmented Reality game, your face becomes the controller, and your webcam turns you into the one and only Jern.  You'll need to dodge and weave to avoid Moon Snails, and prevent the Moon People King from taking over the world.  Jern finally got a haircut- now at the end, we begin.

This game was developed as part of the inaugural Jern Jam.  Special thanks to my entire Twitch community and especially Polerin and GreenWinde for their ideas, help, code, and support!  I couldn't have done it without you!

NOTE- This game requires the use of a webcam.  When you start the game, you'll need to allow your browser to access the webcam for this site.  After allowing access, you should see a preview window with your webcam.  If you have multiple cameras attached, a dropdown menu will be available to select the camera you'd prefer to use.  If your face is not visible, the game will not start.  Finally, if your webcam is already in use by another application, you may have to stop using it in that application and refresh the game in order to begin playing.
